18: נוּגֵ֧י <sup>3013 </sup> <n>[them that are] sorrowful</n> מִמּוֹעֵ֛ד <sup>4150 </sup> <n>for the solemn assembly</n> אָסַ֖פְתִּי <sup>622 </sup> <n>I will gather</n> מִמֵּ֣ךְ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>about</n> הָי֑וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> מַשְׂאֵ֥ת <sup>4864 </sup> <n>of it [was] a burden</n> עָלֶ֖יהָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> חֶרְפָּֽה׃ <sup>2781 </sup> <n>[who] are of thee [to whom] the reproach</n>
19: הִנְנִ֥י <sup>2005 </sup> <n>I am going</n> עֹשֶׂ֛ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>I will undo</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מְעַנַּ֖יִךְ <sup>6031 </sup> <n>all that afflict</n> בָּעֵ֣ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>Behold at that time</n> הַהִ֑יא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>I</n> וְהוֹשַׁעְתִּ֣י <sup>3467 </sup> <n>thee and I will save</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַצֹּלֵעָ֗ה <sup>6760 </sup> <n>her that halteth</n> וְהַנִּדָּחָה֙ <sup>5080 </sup> <n>her that was driven out</n> אֲקַבֵּ֔ץ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>and gather</n> וְשַׂמְתִּים֙ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>and I will get</n> לִתְהִלָּ֣ה <sup>8416 </sup> <n>them praise</n> וּלְשֵׁ֔ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>and fame</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָאָ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in every land</n> בָּשְׁתָּֽם׃ <sup>1322 </sup> <n>where they have been put to shame</n>
20: בָּעֵ֤ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>At that time</n> הַהִיא֙ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>I</n> אָבִ֣יא <sup>935 </sup> <n>will I bring</n> אֶתְכֶ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> וּבָעֵ֖ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>you [again] even in the time</n> קַבְּצִ֣י <sup>6908 </sup> <n>that I gather</n> אֶתְכֶ֑ם <sup>853 </sup> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Indeed</n> אֶתֵּ֨ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>you for I will make</n> אֶתְכֶ֜ם <sup>853 </sup> לְשֵׁ֣ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>you a name</n> וְלִתְהִלָּ֗ה <sup>8416 </sup> <n>and a praise</n> בְּכֹל֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עַמֵּ֣י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>among all people</n> הָאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> בְּשׁוּבִ֧י <sup>7725 </sup> <n>when I turn back</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁבוּתֵיכֶ֛ם <sup>7622 </sup> <n>your captivity</n> לְעֵינֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>5869 </sup> <n>before your eyes</n> אָמַ֥ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n>
